1.title: Point of veiw

choices: No, i havent told her yet
11.content:
So Kyon will be the one to tell this story, but there's one thing that needs to be known:
does Haruhi know she's god?
11.title: Kyon's Point of veiw

115.content:
Sigh. Another day, with Haruhi contantly flicking me during class, which she only ever did if there was something on her mind. Fearing the worse, I turned to face her when the bell rang. She had an evil smile on her face, and before i knew it, i was being dragged by my tie back to the clubroom. I swear, Haruhi has to live here, theres just to many odds and ends.
"ok, you stay here."
"H-Hey, Wait where are you-" but she was already gone.
Sighing, I realized That being the only one in the room was boring. Even Nagato wasn't here yet. That's probibly where Haruhi went, to go get everyone.

So i sat down in one of the chairs, and turned on the laptop that was right there. As i did, i thought about Haruhi's computer. She's on it all the time, but we never see anything she does.
115.title: And so it begins...

choices: Find some more of this Giantess stuff
1151.content:
Throwing caution to the wind, I decided to see what Haruhi does in her spare time. She had a few computer games, and the internet browser was up, nothing seemed outta the ordinary.
But then I saw a folder hidden in the corner of her desktop. It was labled GTS, whatever that means. I figured, I'm bored anyway.
Inside the folder, i found many pictures, and a few videos. It was kinda disturbing to finally know what haruhi looked at: Women, Fifty feet tall at least, smashing through towns. The video's showed girls Growing up to those hights, shreading there cloths. It was hard to belive that something like this excisted, but that didn't stop me from looking at it...
1151.title: Check out the computer

choices: “What were you guys just talking about?!”
11511.content:
Well, this was definitely a direction I hadn’t expected the day to take. Of course, unexpected occurrences are pretty common these days for me, but discovering that our ever-fearless and increasingly fear-inducing leader was into murder porn took a far different tone than the usual affairs.

Three different thoughts ran through my mind. One, do the others know about this? It seems like this would be even more incentive to make sure Haruhi never finds out anything about anything, so as silly as it is on the surface, it would probably be something they and their organizations would need to keep in mind. Two, how messed up is it that someone with this kind of a dangerous fetish has the power to make it happen? For that matter, if she’s really into the idea of this, what if it happens even WITHOUT her directly trying? Even Koizumi couldn’t rationalize it away if she or some other random girl suddenly ended up sprawled out on the streets at a hundred-plus feet tall.

And thirdly, if she catches me looking at this, I’m a dead man no matter what. This one struck me just in time, and no less than five seconds after I dove back into the safety of my own seat, in she came, followed closely by our resident Cheshire Cat. Smiling as incessantly as ever, Koizumi greeted me and sat down across the table, unsheathing a deck of cards for whatever our latest game would be. As usual, he gave no indication of whether or not he knew something was up.

The next twenty minutes, by comparison, were unremarkable. Nagito entered and took up her designated place, I got my unusually distracted rear end handed to me in poker, and Ms. Supersadist presumably scrolled through and savored her unholy collection. Finally, while I was using half my brain to think about this new situation and the other half to try and determine if the grinning fool was bluffing again, Haruhi shot back up and proclaimed that she was going to track down the slightly tardy Miss Asahina.

I folded my hand, if only for the sake of speeding things up, and immediately briefed Koizumi on what I had just seen.

His smile never wavered. “In a technical sense, that is news to me. Given recent events, however, I can’t say it’s all that surprising; in fact, it actually relates to something I wanted to discuss with you, and provides a rather easy answer for what had seemed like a difficult question.”

What kind of recent events? It seemed to me like everything had been relatively normal.

“In short, the last avatar I battled actually took the form of Miss Suzumiya itself. Not only that, but its behavior changed somewhat, too. From time to time, it paused its usual destruction of the local buildings to do some rather unsavory things to groups of imaginary people and other objects. I have to say, it was more than a little bit unsettling, in part because it was such a sudden transformation.”

Oh boy, that sure sounds promising. Well, as the resident Haruhi expert, any ideas as to why this is happening?

“Obviously I can’t give any theories with one-hundred-percent confidence, but to hazard a quick guess, I think it may be a simple matter of her discovering this fetish and craving the ability to act it out just like anybody else would. The manifestation of it in closed space could be seen as an additional way to subconsciously relieve a different kind of stress, if you know what I’m saying.”

Can’t say I really do.

Now he seemed to grimace, if only for a bit. “Sexual frustration. It would be best not to go into excessive detail, but as I said, that entity did - or at least wanted to do - some rather unsavory things.”

Well, I suppose that’s as good as official confirmation: somebody with the actual power of a goddess has sexual fantasies about killing scores of innocent people. As if I needed any more reasons to be so apprehensive of her. I voiced this sentiment, and Koizumi might have replied, but as the sound of movement in the hall got closer and closer he chose instead to resume his normal mask and deal us another hand.

It seemed to be just in time again. Miss Asahina, looking as usual lovely in ways I struggle to properly describe, entered with a slightly nervous face and her usual greetings. Nothing unusual there. Haruhi followed her in, closing the door behind her roughly, looking fired up about something or another. Business as usual there, too.

And then she opened her mouth.
11511.title: Haruhi's back

11512.content:
The closeing of the door pulled me from the computer. I feared the worse, but it was just Yuki. I breathed a little easier. But then i noticed she was staring at me. It was a penetrating gaze, something i wasn't quite used to, and frankly, i was rather disturbed by it. Would;nt you be?
"You found it?"
She must have been refering to the pictures." How did-"
"I'm always observing."
"But you always have your nose in a book. I figured you only reacted to what you needed to."
"I only do, but I still observe everything. For example, Haruhi will be here in thirty seconds, so logging off is the best course of action."

I listened to her, and then sat at my laptop, the pictures still floating through my head. Haruhi returned with...
11512.title: Yuki arrives

115121.content:
The telltale cry of Mikuru being dragged through the hall was all the warning anyone needed: Haruhi was back.
Kicking the door in, Haruhi stood very triumphant, like a lion after a kill. Mikuru was in her grasp, looking very scared; Can't say I blame her.

"Ok, Since Itsuki isn't here today, were going to have club with just us. Mikuru, get in your maid outfit as I debreef everyone."

Wait," I said, "shouldn't you just tell us. Mikuru doesn't need to dress up."

"Ya she does, our party needs the MOE character. We are going to find an Alien. common, lets go."

"Haruhi, this is insane. do you know how many times we have searched. Were not going to find anything."
I felt the air tense as I said this, and we all looked at Haruhi. I had just outright told her that her idea wasn't going to work.
She turned towards me, and looked...
115121.title: Mikuru and Haruhi.

info.brief_description: The SOS Brigade is growing through a few changes...
info.description:
Ok, My first story for Wirting.com, YAY.
So here's the general gist of it: Haruhi, Being god, also has a giantess fetish.
So let make god happy, Aight?

I'd like the point of veiw to be either Haruhi's or Kyon's, But I'm not going to inforce it.

Crushing, Vore, Rape (in the form of Mikuru) are all allowed. So have at it, and be sure to add.
